item.title: Rep
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:377892”][quote author=Saphire` link=topic=473766.msg3464173#msg3464173 date=1294775428]
Can my point get answered? Why do you find this post so offensive? Its aimed for discussion.
[/quote]Your point was answered multiple times, and I shall reiterate it.

Reputation currently means nothing. It used to, and some members of these forums actually earned it. Though, reputation is abused so much on these forums, only new members think rep means something. If people tie reputation to popularity/knowledge, then they are idiots. If they want to be known, they need to get a name out there for them. Reputation won’t help. They need to teach people something, help people out, or contribute to the community by releasing something actually worth releasing, and not just an editted private server. I suggest not removing the reputation system, but possibly redoing it, resetting everyone, and attempting to stabilize the system.

Yes, we all know it will eventually get abused more, but MITB may be able to implement some type of system, such as if a user reps (positive or negative) more than, say ten people, in a short, given, amount of time, then they are flagged. Then he could allow moderators to view those flags and punish the reputation abusers at their will/discretion.

If you feel otherwise, then stop worrying about the rep. As previously mentioned: If you have no time for these forums/you have a life, why do you bother on our systems?[/quote]

When i first joined, you could only hand out rep once every 2 days, or something like that.
I think that system was quite good.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep
item.dc:creator: @asyo4 asyo4
item.description:
@asyo4 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=EMINEM BEAST™ link=topic=473766.msg3464307#msg3464307 date=1294780227]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=473766.msg3464301#msg3464301 date=1294779944]

[quote author=EMINEM BEAST™ link=topic=473766.msg3464298#msg3464298 date=1294779827]
I didn’t start shit. Just drop it.
[/quote]Drop what? This is a discussion thread, I was discussing it. You posted something totally irrevelant (spamming) by calling me a spammer. Yet, I posted something totally relevant to the reputation matter at hand.

/thread
[/quote]Nope.

Because you like post count?

I don’t care for post count, and I do admit to spamming. I’ve asked on numerous occasions for both a reputation and post count reset, but none of the admins will give me one. This isn’t my own fault. I don’t care about my rep, nor my post count. I just want to learn.

]Then you shouldn’t start anything if you know you don’t care/can’t win.

[/quote]They were still relevant to your irrelevancy. But, before I get muted again, I will stop arguing with you as you are incompetent to be a bigger person and stop posting. So good day.[/quote]
Don’t worry Vain, you won’t get muted because of a fucking idiot who’s trying to act cool.

Read full topic
